var hideKurs = false;
fetch('https://iss.moex.com/iss/statistics/engines/currency/markets/selt/rates.json?iss.meta=off')
.then((response) => {
    if (!response.ok) {
        throw new Error('HTTP error, status = ' + response.status);
    }
    return response.json();
})
.then((json) => {
    // Текущий курс доллара ЦБРФ
document.querySelector("#kurs-dollar > span:nth-child(2)").innerText = json.cbrf.data[0][json.cbrf.columns.indexOf('CBRF_USD_LAST')]

document.querySelector("#kurs-euro > span:nth-child(2)").innerText = json.cbrf.data[0][json.cbrf.columns.indexOf('CBRF_EUR_LAST')]

})

.catch((error) => {
    console.error(error);
    hideKurs = true;
})
.finally(() => {
if(!hideKurs) {
jQuery('#kurs').css('display', 'flex');
console.log('showing rates');
}});

</script>
